Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2016 05:37PM ctroxc wrote: I'm about to have the Preventative Double Mastectomy w/ DIEP Flap reconstruction. We have an extensive family history my middle daughter had the Preventative Double Mastectomy with implants in April. She recommended finding a pen pal of sorts who was going through the same thing she had one and swears it made it easier on her.
